description:
Move into luxury with this stunning Hampton-style Queenslander in the friendly neighbourhood of Scarborough. Filled with an abundance of wonderful features and central to a number of local schools, shops, and parks, the perfect home is waiting for you!
Straight through the entry is the spacious living area, set in a quiet section of the house perfect to unwind in after a long day. To the right of the living is the recently renovated laundry room, perfect for keeping noisy appliances out of sight. Continuing back through the French doors is the gorgeous, covered patio, barbeque area, backyard, and private pool. Entertain family and guests alike with the perfect summer pool party and barbeque in the comfort of your own home.
Moving upstairs, you're greeted with the generous dining and gorgeous open-plan kitchen. Equipped with stunning Caesarstone benchtops, gas cooktop, self-cleaning Steam oven, and peaceful suburban views, cooking in this kitchen will be an absolute delight. Following the hallway down, you'll find the rumpus room overlooking the backyard and pool area – perfect for a second living or designated playroom. Work or study in the privacy of your own home in the cosy office, just off the rumpus.
At the centre of the home are three spacious bedrooms, all fitted with built-in robes for convenient storage space. The luxurious Master also features its own private ensuite and generous built-in robe. The ensuite and main bath are fitted with spacious showers – as well as a bath in the main - and are recently updated, showcasing a bright, elegant design with wooden accents.
Throw the perfect barbeque, relax in the comfort of your own bedroom, or simply unwind with the sunset on the beautiful balcony. Create the dream home for you and the family or add to your investment portfolio in the lucrative suburb of Scarborough. Don't wait – this beautiful home could be yours!

Highlights of the property includes
- Four generous bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
- Private ensuite in the Master
- Gorgeous Polished Hardwood Floors throughout
- Luxurious vaulted ceilings
- Recently updated, open-plan kitchen with plenty of counter space which flows into the dining
- Self-cleaning Steam oven and gas cook top stove
- Recently renovated, private laundry room keeps noisy appliances and dirty washing out of sight
- Two spacious bathrooms with sizeable showers – inclusive of a bath in the recently renovated main
- Linen closet for convenient storage
- Large living room with ample space for the family to kick back and enjoy time together
- Separate Rumpus room ideal as a playroom or second living/entertainment room, overlooking the beautiful garden and pool
- Private office area – perfect for home-based professionals
- Cosy study nook great for homework or little projects
- Spacious timber balcony with stunning sunset views
- Access from the downstairs living that opens up to the covered patio BBQ area and backyard
- Stunning pool area with merbou decking
- Ceiling fans throughout the house for added comfort and air flow
- Air conditioning unit installed in the dining for relief in the hotter months and comfort in the cooler months
- Double car lock up garage with plenty of room for storage
- Solar Panels installed to save on energy costs
- NBN Ready

Centrally located and close to:
• 4 min from Dolphin Central Shopping Centre (1.5 km)
• 2 min away from Scarborough State School (650 m)
• 3 min away from Redcliffe State High School (1.8 km)
• Close to restaurants/cafe's/shops
• Close to public transport; train stations and bus stops within walking distance
• Parks, bicycle and walking tracks near by

This home has been lovingly maintained and is child and pet friendly. There are many lifestyle features not mentioned above which all add to its functionality and liveability. This home is perfect to either raise your family, watch the area grow, reap the rental return, or simply enjoy life in the suburbs. Don't miss this opportunity to secure this home in this superb location.
Contact Joel Clifford on 0401 038 355 to book your viewing today
